column5: Was told about spending a day called cast and blast. This is where you hunt then fish then hunt again. Cool way to spend a day. Kinda like a surf and turf day.  Lets just say,casting was a blast. LOL  Choice of arms,    Only surfed a couple today. But with no turf,I decided to let them swim free for another day.      Casting is a blast.
Beauties!! "Like shooting fish in a barrel"? Lol
That's pretty cool B. You'll get your turf next time!
Nice going Bryan. Those are some fresh looking steelies.  Ps: is this what they call combat fishing? I would not want to mess with you. Lol
guess when your holding a gun, the guys don't grease you  lol  nice fish
A beauty day to get out. Nice pics
You certainly did better than I! Great fish there
Nice looking shotty, and a couple nice eaters too!
Nice shooting er casting.  Nice looking fish.
So what do you do shoot first then go get them put the hook in there mouth and take pic of there best side? You need a tv show lol. I know lots of guys down my way that blast cast and blast again.
Great guns!!,they are nice fish!!  .
Thanks everyone. It sure is a lot of fun. The best part I get out of it is the walking. Or should I say,the work out. Bush wacking is an awesome work out. Makes this body feel great.
I was wondering what load for Steelhead?
guess when your holding a gun, the guys don't grease you  lol  nice fish yeah I bet not!  LOL!  Nice report B.  Is it still a skunking when you don't get to fire the gun?
Don,t YOU forget it. LOL  Naw Geoff. it,s an added feature to the day.LOL  Hope to get out with a bud that has a dog that knows where the birds and wabbits are.

Brian, have you been scaring up lots of grouse this year while fishing the river?  I know I have, I think I scared up at least 6 the other day.  Scared the living crap out of me, lol!   Haven't seen this many grouse in a while.

Don,t YOU forget it. LOL  Naw Geoff. it,s an added feature to the day.LOL  Hope to get out with a bud that has a dog that knows where the birds and wabbits are. bah!!!! at least you left me a few to swing some flies at!!  Dog is in prime shape and ready for birds anytime, he's had a good season.
I think I might of had that one on for a few minutes,then pulled the hook out.LOL  Nice fish buddy.
I seen a few and ya,they make ya jump. LOL
It's called surf and turf you chuck'n ducker!!
It's called surf and turf you chuck'n ducker!!    When you have a nice drift going.and along comes some quackers,Im in between watching the float and looking for the shot gun.  It,s a tough call.LOL

When you have a nice drift going.and along comes some quackers,Im in between watching the float and looking for the shot gun.  It,s a tough call.LOL  Couldn't you just "drift" a big juicy dewie their way?
